item.title: mlr3 basics on "iris" - Hello World!
item.description: This use case shows how to use the basic mlr3 package on the iris task, so it’s our “Hello World” example. It assumes no prior knowledge in ML or mlr3. You can find most of the content here also in the mlr3book in a more detailed way. Hence we will not make a lot of general comments here but keep it hands-on and short. The following operations are shown:
